section.heading: Persons entitled to file initial financing statement or continuation statement.
section.text: A person may file an initial financing statement or a continuation statement under this part if:

para.text: The secured party of record authorizes the filing; and
The filing is necessary under this part:
To continue the effectiveness of a financing statement filed before July 1, 2001; or
To perfect or continue the perfection of a security interest.

annotations.annotation: This section permits a secured party to file an initial financing statement or continuation statement necessary under this Part to continue the effectiveness of a financing statement filed before this Article takes effect or to perfect or otherwise continue the perfection of a security interest. Because a filing described in this section typically operates to continue the effectiveness of a financing statement whose filing the debtor already has authorized, this section does not require authorization from the debtor.
